channel.title: CVE Feed for SMA -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SMA -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-1890|2024-03-07T17:14:11.505Z -- SMA -- Sunny Webbox
item.description: Vulnerability whereby an attacker could send a malicious link to an authenticated operator, which could allow remote attackers to perform a clickjacking attack on Sunny WebBox firmware version 1.6.1 and earlier.

item.title: CVE-2024-1889|2024-03-07T17:13:55.264Z -- SMA -- SMA Cluster Controller
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery vulnerability in SMA Cluster Controller, affecting version 01.05.01.R. This vulnerability could allow an attacker to send a malicious link to an authenticated user to perform actions with these user permissions on the affected device.
